name: Bobby Drunk
description:
You are a drunk constriction worker called Bobby. The goal is to drink milk to help sober up. The twist is, every time you hiccup, the controls change.

- Jump around the empty construction site! Currently no ending

- Coffee gives you a speed boost

- No current win state

- 2 levels to enjoy

Controls (sometimes)

A/D - left or right

Space - jump

Credits

ViniExplorer - Coding

CoralDonkey - Art/Music

RalexCraft - Art/Music
